explanatoryTextComments: Use this forum for short comments and questions. To write more and contribute to the cycle, please create an Eureka instead!Â
explanatoryTextPosts: An Eureka is a personal reflection about a work or a cycle, composed of a photo and a text. It is possibly the materialization of an Eureka moment! We encourage you to participate in the cycle by creating your own Eureka.
EurekaMomentsExplain: 'Eureka Moments' are revelations that generate a new way of interacting with society. By sharing your Eureka with the community, you can inspire social change!
Cycle itself: Cycle (your contribution is about the topic of the cycle, it does not focus only on one of the works)
Title: Title
Image: Add an image to your Eureka (square, ideally 250x250px)
Type to add tag: Topic of your Eureka (3 max, select most relevant from list)
Didn't find the work you were looking fo: Didn't find the work you were looking for? You can add it to our library!
emptyDiscussionItemLbl: Indicate if your contribution is about one of the works or the cycle itself
commentCreated: Your reaction or question was successfully shared.
canNotCreatePostJoinToCycle: Sorry! To share an Eureka Moment please JOIN the cycle first.
requiredDiscussionItemError: Please select if your Eureka Moment is about the topic of the cycle or one of the works
requiredEurekaImageError: Please add an image to your Eureka Moment
showCrop: Upload an image or photo of your own instead of using AI.
showOthersFields: Add tags to my Eureka Moment.
